text.div: • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-LocalMarkupIgnore

name: LocalMarkupIgnore
title: LocalMarkupIgnore
description: Tells a receiver to ignore just the local markup tags (local\_markup, local\_header, local\_attr) when value="markup", or to ignore the local markup tags and all contained content when value="all"
